text: Maha Egodage Jayalal Rohana (; 1 November 1964 â€“ 11 February 2021), popularly known as Jayalal Rohana, was a Sri Lankan actor and screenwriter. He was born in Colombo, Sri Lanka. His best known roles were as Rajasinghe in Tikiri Suwanda (2010), Jasomihira in Sinhawalokanaya (2011) and as James Peiris in Nidahase Piya DS (2018). Rohana died on 11 February 2021 at a hospital in Colombo, aged 56. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Sri Lankan screenwriters Category:Sri Lankan movie actors Category:Television actors Category:Sri Lankan stage actors Category:People from Colombo
title: Jayalal Rohana
